name: Destroyer
description: The Destroyer is a menacing humanoid clad in scale mail, exuding an aura of necrotic energy, with a strong physique marked by formidable muscle.
memorable: The Destroyer's ability to command undead allies and deal necrotic damage makes it a fearsome opponent.
goals: It seeks to dominate foes and lead undead forces in battle.
relations: Often encountered with undead creatures, acting as their master.
environment: Commonly found in dark, foreboding places where it can command its undead minions.
strengths: Resistance to necrotic damage and strong physical abilities enhance its combat effectiveness.
weaknesses: Poor Intelligence and average Wisdom may lead to strategic challenges in combat.
attacks: Utilizes a greataxe and claw attacks, dealing both slashing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Undead Commander allows it to enhance combat effectiveness by directing undead allies.
equipment: Scale mail armor and various melee weapons including a greataxe and spear.
senses: Has darkvision with a passive perception of 12, making it aware of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, useful for physical challenges, and has decent Intimidation for influencing others.
additional_information: Can deal extra 1d8 necrotic damage with all weapon attacks.
Has advantage on various saving throws against debilitating effects.
Multiattack feature allows it to strike twice on its turn.
Claw attack includes both piercing and necrotic damage, enhancing its threat level.
Greataxe attack can knock targets prone if they're of Medium size or smaller.
test_queries: destroyer with greataxe and necrotic damage
resilient fighter resistant to necrotic damage
